description: Try our easy to follow Supreme Pizza Jacket Potato Platter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jacket potato,High fibre,High protein,Wheat free,Gluten free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Jul 2020
name: Supreme Pizza Jacket Potato Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 small red onion (thinly sliced into rounds)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Prick potatoes with a fork, place in a bowl, then add oil and toss to coat. Arrange on tray, season, then bake for 1 hour or until tender.

Remove potatoes from oven and cool slightly. Cut in half, spread each with pizza sauce and scatter over cheese. Top with salami, cabanossi, olives, capsicum and onion. Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese has melted and is golden.
Place chilli, pesto and rocket in separate bowls. Arrange potatoes and bowls on a large board. Top potatoes with basil leaves to serve.
